00049 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, const String &config_file, time_t timeout) : m_timeout(timeout) {
00050   System::initialize(install_dir);
00051   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00052   if (config_file == "")
00053     initialize(System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg");
00054   else
00055     initialize(config_file);
00056 }

00059   System::initialize(install_dir);
00060   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00061   initialize(System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg");

00067 void Client::create_table(const String &name, const String &schema) {
00068   int error;
00069   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->create_table(name.c_str(), schema.c_str())) != Error::OK)
00070     HT_THROW(error, "");
00071 }

00085 uint32_t Client::get_table_id(const String &name) {
00086   // TODO: issue 11
00087   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + name;
00088   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00089   Hyperspace::HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00090   uint64_t handle;
00091   uint32_t uval;
00092 
00096   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00097 
00101   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00102 
00106   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00107 
00108   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00109 
00110   memcpy(&uval, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00111 
00112   return uval;
00113 }

00119 String Client::get_schema(const String &name) {
00120   int error;
00121   String schema;
00122   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->get_schema(name.c_str(), schema)) != Error::OK)
00123     HT_THROW(error, "");
00124   return schema;

00131 void Client::get_tables(std::vector<String> &tables) {
00132   uint64_t handle;
00133   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00134   std::vector<Hyperspace::DirEntry> listing;
00135 
00136   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables", OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00137 
00138   m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(handle, listing);
00139 
00140   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00141     if (!listing[i].is_dir)
00142       tables.push_back(listing[i].name);
00143   }
00144 
00145   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00146 
00147 }

00150 void Client::drop_table(const String &name, bool if_exists) {
00151   int error;
00152   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->drop_table(name.c_str(), if_exists)) != Error::OK)
00153     HT_THROW(error, "");

00157   int error;
00158   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->shutdown()) != Error::OK)
00159     HT_THROW(error, "");

00173 void Client::initialize(const String &config_file) {
00174 
00175   m_props_ptr = new Properties(config_file);
00176 
00177   if (m_timeout == -1) {
00178     m_timeout = (time_t)m_props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Client.Timeout", HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT);
00179   }
00180 
00181   m_comm = Comm::instance();
00182   m_conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(m_comm);
00183   
00184   m_props_ptr->set_int("Hyperspace.Client.Timeout", (int)m_timeout);
00185 
00186   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(m_comm, m_props_ptr);
00187   while (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(2)) {
00188     cout << "Waiting for connection to Hyperspace..." << flush;
00189     poll(0, 0, 5000);
00190     cout << endl << flush;
00191   }
00192 
00193   m_app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00194 
00195   m_master_client_ptr = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, m_timeout, m_app_queue_ptr);
00196   if (m_master_client_ptr->initiate_connection(0) != Error::OK) {
00197     HT_ERROR("Unable to establish connection with Master, exiting...");
00198     exit(1);
00199   }
00200 }
